pages.title: Orbital Scan #0084
pages.text: $(bold)Subject: Concentrated Acheronite Storage$()$(br2)9 Refined Acheronite ingots compressed into a single block. It radiates a $(bold)+10°C warmth aura$() in a 3-block radius. The coldest material on Earth somehow keeps things warm in bulk.$(br2)$(italic)"That doesn't make sense."$(br)"Neither does the sun abandoning you." — ORSA$(br2)Use as compact storage or supplementary heat. It won't replace a heater, but it'll keep your toes attached.

pages.title: Acheronite Block
pages.text: 9 ingots in a grid. An expensive, cold brick that somehow radiates warmth. ORSA physics at its finest.

pages.title: Back to Ingots
pages.text: Place in a crafting grid for 9 ingots back. No refunds on the existential dread.
